additionalProperty.name: Ingredients
additionalProperty.value: Refer to our website for full information

additionalProperty.name: Warning
additionalProperty.value: DO NOT USE SILKS, LEATHER OR WOOLLENS. TAKE PARTICULAR CARE WITH POLYESTER/VISCOSE. DO NOT USE WITH CHLORINE BLEACH. DO NOT SOAK METAL BUTTONS OR ZIPPERS FOR MORE THAN ONE HOUR TO AVOID DISCOLOURATION. ALWAYS USE SARD IN A PLASTIC LINED TUB OR BUCKET. KEEP OUT OF REACH OF CHILDREN. NOT TO BE TAKEN. Avoid direct contact of powder with skin and eyes. If swallowed do not induce vomiting. Drink slowly a glass of milk or water and seek medical attention. If product contacts with eyes rinse thoroughly with water. Call a doctor if irritation persists.

description: Sard Wonder Ultra Whitening Stain Remover Soaker
name: Ultra Whitening Stain Remover Soaker
